title: Silver Rises to Record, Gold Near All-Time High as Risks Persist
description: Silver rose to a record and gold traded near an all-time high, as geopolitical tensions persisted.
content: Silver rose to a record and gold traded near an all-time high, as geopolitical tensions persisted.
